Title: Azeroth's Voice
Description:
I haven't spoken with Azeroth for years. At first I just didn't feel the need. Then I realized I had started to resent her. For leaving me like... this. And now I'm not sure if I can.

But I know the stakes. This Radiant Song of hers foretells something dire. And we need to know what.

First, we need to prepare the Heart Chamber. Can ye start up the consoles nearby?
CompletionText: I understand Magni's concerns, but we have no other choice. The future of our world is at stake. We must try everything we can to understand what Azeroth is trying to warn us of.
RewardText: This has never happened before. Magni is the Speaker of Azeroth. Why would communing with her cause him to collapse?

Objectives.Text: Talk to Magni to begin the ritual
